name: PiroxiumDiffusion
description:
General use model trained using offset noise, uses default stable diffusion VAE.

I recommend playing with the strength of the trigger word eg: (PiroxiumDiffusionStyle:0.7)

modelVersions.name: v1.1
modelVersions.description: Improved photorealism capabilities as well as improved landscapes.
